mapper.select: select pmPcRoomNo , sitted , pmSeats from placement A join pcRoom B on A.pmpcroomno = B.pcroomno where B.pcRoomName=#{pcRoomName}
mapper.update: update placement set pmcontent =#{pmContent}, sitted = #{sitted} where pmPcRoomNo = #{pmPcRoomNo}
update placement set sitted=#{sitted} where pmPcRoomNo=#{pcRoomNo}
mapper.delete: delete from reserved where reservedEndtime <= sysdate
mapper.update: update member set memberCash = memberCash+#{cash} where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from pcRoomDetail where place_name like '%'||#{pcRoomName}||'%'
select * from pcRoomDetail where place_name like '%'||#{place_name}||'%' order by (#{x}-x)+(#{y}-y) asc
